alert.note: Alert for Central and South Weld County; Morgan County; Northeast Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 3:47PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Weld and Morgan Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 347 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Jackson Reservoir to 7 miles west of Wiggins, or along a line extending from 31 miles east of Greeley to 22 miles west of Fort Morgan. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Morgan, Brush, Wiggins, Log Lane Village, Orchard, Antelope Springs, Weldona, Jackson Reservoir, Snyder, Riverside Reservoir, Adena School and Goodrich. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
